widget.header: Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

config.title: HelpDesk.
config.description: We have completed a significant upgrade to the HelpDesk interface, covering both the application and infrastructure. This ensures that we are now using the latest version and benefiting from enhanced functionality.

config.title: QA Automation.
config.description: This month, we have integrated additional features into our HelpDesk QA tests. Furthermore, our visual regression tests now encompass numerous Justia properties, such as the Justia U.S. Supreme Court Center, the Justia Mexico Portal, Justia Marketing, and Justia Law.

config.title: Justia Elevate.
config.description: We are continually enhancing Justia Elevate. In addition to our regular updates, we have introduced new information blocks and process stripes, offering users more versatile tools. Furthermore, we prioritize security by upgrading to the latest version of WordPress.

config.title: Justia Business Contracts.
config.description: We have rolled out a search bar for Justia Business Contracts. This enhancement encompasses contract categories, industries, companies, and titles, streamlining the process for all users to find the necessary information.

config.title: Justia Connect.
config.description: We have implemented a convenient "Add to Calendar" feature, enabling users to add upcoming webinars to their calendars effortlessly.

config.title: Justia Jobs.
config.description: We released the newest version of Justia Jobs. A new platform for our users to search for legal jobs and explore employment opportunities. The site is automatically updated from multiple sources and, in the future, Justia Connect Pro members will be able to have their jobs featured on listing pages.

config.title: Webinars.
config.description: We continue promoting Justia Webinars by adding a dedicated sidebar feed that will display our upcoming events. This component is already live in the sidebar of some properties and will be appearing in the rest soon.
